creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
In the following, it seems that only the tspan for which systemLanguage
evaluates to true should be displayed. Both are displayed with the CVS
base of 11/30/2001.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 20010904//EN" 
"http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-SVG-20010904/DTD/svg10.dtd">
<svg viewBox="0 0 1024 768">
	<style type="text/css">text { fill:blue; stroke:none; font-size: 32 
}</style>
	<text y="140">
		<tspan x="0">AAAAA</tspan>
		<tspan x="0" dy="40" systemLanguage="fr">BBBBB</tspan>
		<tspan x="0" dy="40" systemLanguage="en">CCCCC</tspan>
	</text>
</svg>
